titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the discovery and apprehension of several trayterous conspirators herein named.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at the court at Whitehal, the tenth day of November, in the fifteenth year of His Majesties reign.
Steele notation: and Insurrection 2) England other; Arms 73.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
Two copies are filmed consecutively at reel C18:1[175]-[176].
